page.title: 19A Walk on Cannock Chase (1)
page.content:
Spring on Cannock Chase is when the leaves grow on the trees. Spring on Cannock Chase is when the buds open and bloom for all to see. Spring on Cannock chase is when you can smell the distant pine trees. Spring on Cannock Chase is a good thing to see. Summer on Cannock Chase is when the forest is bright and the smell of flowers floats around in the air. Summer on Cannock Chase is a good thing to see. Autumn on Cannock Chase is when the leaves turn gold and you walk on a bed of leaves. Autumn on Cannock is when you hear the leaves crunching under your feet. Autumn on Cannock Chase is a good thing to see.
(continued on page 20)
